p:
This study seeks to answer the following central question: What are the priority actions that can be taken to build community resilience against flood risks and to enhance synergy between DRR, CCA, and development groups in Jakarta? To answer this question, this study will address these two sub-questions:
What are the desirable characteristics of and influential barriers to community resilience against flood risks in Jakarta from the perspective of all stakeholder groups? and
What are the commonalities and differences between key stakeholders of each group in defining efforts to build community resilience to flood risks in Jakarta?
